NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: SnowConnect is a fully-featured skiing and snowboarding tracking app with many pre-built feauteres and social addons.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Allow this app access to your location and start tracking. You can review your traces during and even after your slide.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: What to compare with your friends? Or simply just connect with them? Sign in to chat, challenge or find your friends on the sloap.
WELCOME_INTRO: Get Connected by creating an account first
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
